knotty_direct_mongoose_bend: The first VR dating app. Join over 100,000 people for dates in VR apps like VRChat.
green_plain_mongoose_lend: Meet new people in Virtual Reality ‚ù§Ô∏è Flirtual helps you go on dates in VR and VRChat‚Ä¶
hard_cause_trick_puzzling:
Our story

Hey, we're Kyle and Tony, the creators of Flirtual. Kyle has been obsessed with VR since the early days of Oculus, but it really changed his life when he joined VRChat and met some of his closest friends (including his wife!) there. Right before COVID hit, Kyle brought his childhood best friend Tony along for the journey, and VR also changed his life. We set out to help others meet awesome people around the world too, starting with VRLFP (Virtual Reality Looking For Partner).

Immersive presence in VR helps you form deep connections with people anywhere in the world. By bridging geographic distance and putting personality first, our mission is to find the very best people for you, wherever they are. And to make dating safer and more magical!

In 2022, VRLFP became Flirtual. Rebuilt from the ground up, we've enhanced matchmaking, added personality & interest tags, and launched improved apps. Whether you're looking for a serious relationship that transitions into real life, something more casual in VR, or just new homies, we're ready to help find your perfect match.

‚ù§ kfarwell, Tony & The Flirtual Team

Join our Discord

P.S. We've come a long way from VRLFP's humble beginnings, but we're still a small team rooted in the VR community.

We appreciate your patience as we work hard to make Flirtual as awesome as it can be. Please let us know if you find any bugs or have any suggestions!

The team

Timeline

news.footer:

üíª Did you know Flirtual is open source? If you're a developer, you can help build the future of Flirtual.

üí¨ Join our Discord community and VRChat group for events and more!

2025_location.title: Location, location, location
2025_location.body: You can now optionally add your location and timezone to see how close people are and what time it is for them.
2025_location.location_priority_help: Slide right to see more people nearby, or left to see more people we think you'll like farther away.

2025_catch_up.title: New-ish profile tags!
2025_catch_up.body:
In case you didn't notice, we added these relationship tags a while back. Now we have a way to show you new things like this, so here they are. Let people know what you're looking for!

More recent stuff you may have missed:

  • Answer some prompts on your profile
  • Add a music playlist to your profile

2025_wrapped.title: Flirtual Wrapped 2025
2025_wrapped.body:
Happy New Year! You know what that means. Data visualizations! We'll be kicking off 2026 with some new features for the international Flirtual community, and to start we wanted to share this little map of the matches you made around the world in 2025, along with some of the profile tags that were uniquely popular in each region.

What have we been doing all year?

It's been a while since our last update. We don't have many flashy new features to share, but we've been hard at work behind the scenes on performance, stability, matchmaking & safety. You should find things load much faster, encounter a lot less bugs/errors, and see more relevant profiles. Had trouble the last time you used Flirtual? Give it another try and let us know if you're still having any issues!

We do have a couple small new features:

  • üìç When you expand someone's profile picture that was taken in VRChat, you'll now see a link in the corner to visit the world it was taken in.
    • This will appear for pictures taken recently with metadata enabled in the VRChat camera options or in VRCX. Don't worry, we still remove all other image metadata for your privacy!
  • üîó When you add your VRChat username to your profile, we'll look it up and link it directly instead of taking you to the search page.
  • üîé You can now adjust Flirtual's font size in the Appearance Settings.
  • üîí For your account's security, we'll now email you a verification code when you log in from a new location.
  • üîë Passkeys are now supported on iOS. Add one in the Password & Passkeys Settings to log in more conveniently & securely.

What's coming in 2026

  • Translations. Finally!
  • Geolocation. You'll be able to optionally share your location to see people near you. Compared to our current country-based matchmaking, this will help folks in big countries like the US find people within the same/neighboring states, as well as folks in places like Europe find people in neighboring countries.
    • We'll store your location with a random offset, only show approximate distance, and have additional measures to protect your privacy.
  • Timezones. You'll be able to add your timezone to your profile and see how much later or earlier it is for other people.
  • Advanced filters and more matchmaking improvements.
  • More account connections/integrations.
  • And much more! Look forward to a busy year ahead.

2024_wrapped.title: Flirtual Wrapped 2024
2024_wrapped.body:
Happy New Year - here's what happened with Flirtual in 2024! üéä

New year, new you?

Why not take a moment to refresh your profile?

  • üÜï Answer some profile prompts in the Bio & Pics Settings.
  • üÜï Add a music playlist to your profile in the Connection Settings.
  • üéÆ Played any new multiplayer VR games this year? Update your favorites in the Basic Info Settings.
  • üè∑Ô∏è Haven't checked out our new interest tags yet? Take a look in the Interests Settings.
  • üì∏ Snap a selfie at a Flirtual event and add it to your profile in the Bio & Pics Settings.
  • üòª Join our Discord and ask Flitty for ideas or feedback on your profile in #ask-flitty and #profile-feedback.

2024_100k.title: Profile updates, translations, and 100k members on Flirtual
2024_100k.body:
We've got some exciting announcements, profile updates and improvements today, just for you.

Celebrating 100,000 members on Flirtual!

Maybe your next best friend or special someone is one of them? Browse Date Mode or Homie Mode and find out!

What's new on Flirtual?

  • üëã We've overhauled how new members set up their Flirtual profile. It's now easier to get started, and you should start seeing higher quality profiles when browsing.
  • üí≠ Need some inspiration for the perfect profile? Look no further than Prompts, now available in the Bio & Pics Settings.
  • üî≠ Looking for something serious, casual, or just homies? Let people know what you're open to in the Matchmaking Settings.
  • üé∂ You can now add a music playlist to your profile. Add your favorite Spotify, Apple Music, Tidal, Amazon Music or Deezer link in the Connection Settings.
  • üíÖ A fresh new look. Flirtual is prettier than ever, and more consistent across desktop & mobile.
  • ‚úÇÔ∏è No more bad crops! You can now crop profile pictures yourself when you upload them, and tap someone's profile picture to see the full uncropped image.
  • üîÄ You can now reorder your profile pictures on mobile, and reordering is easier on desktop.
  • ‚úèÔ∏è Finally, you can change your profile link! Just press "Share" on your profile page to choose a new one.
  • üåê Language is now a factor in matchmaking, so you'll see more people that know the same languages as you. Premium members can adjust this priority in the Matchmaking Settings. Language filters coming soon for free members too!
  • ‚å®Ô∏è More keyboard shortcuts: HJKL to undo/like/homie/pass, F/Esc to expand & close profile pictures. Such efficiency.
  • ‚úÖ You can now mark all of your messages as read with one click at the top of your match list.
  • üí¨ Messaging now supports spelchekc, and ‚èé line breaks on mobile.
  • üòª Join our Discord and ask our helpful new robo-cat Flitty for dating tips or feedback on your profile in #ask-flitty and #profile-feedback.
  • üêõ Lots of little fixes and improvements.

Call for translators

Translations are coming soon! Want to help translate Flirtual to your language? Join our Discord and say hi in the #translators channel.

2024_homies_day.title: Happy Homies Day!
2024_homies_day.body:
Just wanted to wish you a happy Homies Day! Don't forget to appreciate your homies and check in on them today. Send some cards, visit a friend, or meet new ones in Homie Mode!

What's new on Flirtual?

  • üè∑Ô∏è Lots of new interest tags! We've also increased the limit to 10.
  • üåê Regional pricing on iOS (to start). We've lowered the pricing of Premium in 68 countries to better match local prices.
  • ‚úÖ You can now link your Discord account to get a verified checkmark next to it on your profile. You'll also be able to log in to Flirtual with Discord on web & iOS.
  • üîë You can now add Passkeys to your account to log in securely with your fingerprint, face, device PIN, or security key instead of your password. Welcome to the future!
  • üóëÔ∏è Were you a little too picky? You can now reset your likes or passes (click "More") to see everyone again for a fresh start.
  • ‚å®Ô∏è You can now navigate between profile pictures with your arrow keys, and navigate while pictures are expanded. Wow, so efficient. The buttons are easier to click too.
  • üîî Keeping you in the know: we'll notify you when people like you (once a week) and when your daily profiles refresh (only if you ran out yesterday).
  • üì¥ Don't want those? There are more options now to choose which notifications you want to receive.
  • üî¢ You'll now get a badge on the iOS app icon with the number of unread notifications.
  • üì∏ You can now attach screenshots or other evidence when reporting someone. Thanks for keeping Flirtual safe!
  • ‚ö°Ô∏è Profiles now load much faster when browsing.
  • üçé Optimized for Apple Vision Pro! Got one? Try our app and update your VR setup. You can also add FaceTime to your profile.
  • üìú For our Flirtulore enthusiasts: we've updated our About page with a timeline and some fun screenshots.

More fixes

  • üêõ You can now type messages in the Meta Quest app and browser. You don't have to communicate in emojis anymore! But you still can if you want, you do you. Make sure you're on the latest Quest OS for this!
  • üêõ Mobile notifications will now open to the right page of the app (e.g. your messages).
  • üêõ The "Shared interests" matchmaking slider updates correctly now. (If you changed it before this fix on Oct 25, might want to double-check!)
  • üêõ Some more minor fixes and improvements.

What's next?

  • Some fresh UI updates. Flirtual is getting a little prettier and more consistent.
  • More sign-in options. Discord is just the start!
  • At long last, an option to change your username.
  • A new sign-up process that should lead to higher quality profiles.
  • More bug fixes: stuck unread messages, social sign-in on Android, passkeys on iOS/Android, and some browsing issues.

2023_apps_themes.title: New iPhone & Android apps, profile themes, and more
2023_apps_themes.body:
We've got brand new apps for iOS and Android, new profile color themes, lots of bug fixes, and more!

New mobile apps

  • üçé Flirtual is finally available on the App Store for iPhone and iPad! Download on the App Store
  • ü§ñ We built a new and improved Android app with better performance, UI, and native features. Download on Google Play
  • üîî You'll now get notifications for messages and matches on mobile.
  • üí∏ You can now purchase Flirtual Premium in the mobile app with Apple Pay and Google Pay. You can also use PayPal through Apple/Google Pay.

Profile colors

  • üíÖ Premium subscribers can now customize their profile colors. These will be visible to everyone viewing your profile.
  • üé® Choose from our preset themes or pick your own colors to show off your style and make a memorable first impression.

More fixes and updates

  • üìñ Hover over a gender, sexuality, or kink tag to see a definition and learn more.
  • üß™ Matchmaking adjustments: you should see more relevant people, and more people in your country.
  • üêõ You can now see when someone was last active on their profile again.
  • üêõ Sometimes unmatched users would still appear in your match list. Not anymore.
  • üêõ If you had certain symbols in your VRChat username, the link on your profile didn't work. Now it should.
  • üêõ The chat interface disappeared on some older browsers/systems. We found it.
  • üêõ The Pass button should no longer be cut off on smaller phone screens.
  • üêõ Some people's ages were off by a year. We mostly fixed it, but your birthday might still be off by a day depending on your timezone. Time is hard.
  • üêõ Switching between Date Mode and Homie Mode works more reliably. We deployed a temporary fix today with a side effect of making this navigation a bit slower, but we'll have a proper solution out in the coming days.
  • üêõ A service outage on October 5 caused issues with matching, creating an account, and changing your email. We fixed it. Sorry!

What's next?

  • Faster, smoother browsing.
  • Bug fixes: issues with the Undo button and the unread message indicator.
  • Sign-in with Google, Apple, etc.
  • Translations.

üí¨ DJ Night returns this Friday, plus fresh new events weekly!

2023_matchmaking.title: Matchmaking updates and fixes
2023_matchmaking.body:
What's new?

  • üß™ You will now see more recently active users when browsing. This should get you more matches!
  • üßΩ Behind-the-scenes moderation updates. We're keeping Flirtual squeaky-clean for you.
  • üêõ The "See who likes you" button was counting your likes incorrectly, so we hid it. Now it's back and counting correctly!
  • üêõ Various matchmaking and formatting fixes.

What's next?

  • Premium changes coming June 19th - last chance to purchase Premium at the current price!
  • Lots of little fixes and quality of life enhancements.
  • Mobile app improvements including push notifications and payments.
  • Bio prompts.
  • Translations.

2023_rewrite.title: Welcome to the new and improved Flirtual!
2023_rewrite.body:
We've completely rebuilt Flirtual from the ground up, with huge performance improvements and a new UI. We're also making some changes to browsing and Premium.

We fixed Flirtual!

  • Loading, navigating the app, and matchmaking is now super fast and you shouldn't see crashes or errors. (OK, no promises. But definitely less often.)
  • Lots of UI and usability improvements, especially on mobile. Did you know we have mobile apps? Now they are better. Check them out! (Soon, they will be even better-er!)
  • Some more little features, bug fixes, and polish.

Matchmaking change: more profiles

  • You will now be able to view up to 30 profiles per day in regular browsing, and 30 profiles in Homie Mode.
  • You will still be able to Like/Homie up to 15 profiles in each mode.

Premium changes coming on June 19

  • We're updating our pricing to help us cover costs and keep improving Flirtual. Monthly Premium subscriptions will now be $14.99/mo, while longer subscriptions are getting bigger discounts: 33% off @ $29.99 for 3mo, and 50% off @ $44.99 for 6mo.
  • Last chance to buy Lifetime Premium @ $99.99: Lifetime Premium will be $129.99 after June 19.
  • We've removed the Supporter tier and made the ability to control your algorithm available to everyone on the Premium plan instead.
  • If you already have a subscription on June 19, you'll keep your current pricing as long as you remain subscribed.

Thanks for supporting us! These changes will help us cover our costs, improve our product, and make Flirtual even better for years to come ‚ù§

What's next?

  • There are still a couple little things missing in the new app, and a few new bugs. We'll be fixing that over the coming weeks! Further performance improvements to come too.
  • More mobile improvements: push notifications, mobile payments, and availability on the iOS App Store. (You can still install the iOS app through Safari.)
  • Translations! Want to help? Let us know.
  • Lots more!

nimble_equal_loris_foster: We host speed matching and DJ events every weekend in VRChat, and you're invited!
flaky_early_shad_nourish: For our event schedule and announcements, <discord>join our Discord server</discord>.
blue_calm_chipmunk_spark: Our weekly events are hosted in our VRChat worlds, but you can join them anytime! Feel free to use them for your own events too.
careful_wise_bumblebee_walk: Get to know people in 1-on-1 speed dating/friend-making rounds. Each round is 3 minutes long (the host can choose a round length from 3-7 minutes). Conversation prompts, interest tags, and night mode included.
sweet_mellow_ant_hunt: Outdoor music festival with audiolink. Vibe on.
dry_inclusive_ox_trust: Created by <faxmashine>Faxmashine</faxmashine>, our worlds are compatible with PCVR, Quest, and Desktop. New to VRChat? <vrchat>Sign up for free.</vrchat>
seemly_sticky_frightening_fetch:
We want Flirtual to be a positive, welcoming space for everyone. These community guidelines give more information on how we moderate user profiles and behavior on Flirtual. Breaking these guidelines will result in account moderation, such as a permanent ban from Flirtual. We reserve the right to moderate accounts at our discretion.

Respect each other

No hate speech or hateful actions against any group

This includes racist, sexist, or otherwise hateful symbols and content against certain groups in your Flirtual profile or conversations.

No harassment

This includes bullying, unsolicited sexual content, direct or indirect threats, doxxing, witch-hunts, stalking, or attacking other users on your profile.

No spam, trolling, impersonation, misrepresentation, or scams

Do not try and take advantage of other users on Flirtual. Do not pretend that you are someone you are not.

No NSFW pictures

Full nudity is not allowed on Flirtual, for both in-person and avatar pictures. This includes no "pasties", highly revealing clothing, or highly sexualized poses.

Limited NSFW on a profile

Please avoid graphic NSFW text in your bio. The majority of your bio should also be SFW, not NSFW. Please limit NSFW words or phrases used in your profile. You are free to use the NSFW tags and non-graphic custom interests.

Stay on topic

Flirtual is a platform for dating and making friends. The main purpose of your profile and behavior on Flirtual should follow that.

No solicitation

Do not ask other users for money or post monetized social links (e.g. PayPal). Do not advertise or market products or services on Flirtual.

No controversial or highly political content

Please talk about politics/religion/controversial topics somewhere else.

No violent content or depictions of violence

Gore or violent pictures that shock people will be removed and may lead to a ban.

No pictures of children or minors

We do not tolerate content involving minors, such as real-life pictures of children. This is for the safety of users and children.

Limited self-promotion

You can link non-payment-related social links in your bio (such as Instagram or Discord), but self-promotion or any promotion cannot be the main purpose of your Flirtual profile or account.

No self-harm content

Self-harm content is not allowed on Flirtual. We have some mental health resources that may be helpful.

Respect Flirtual

No illegal activity

Do not do anything on Flirtual that breaks your local laws or the laws of Canada, where Flirtual is hosted.

No underage users

Flirtual is strictly 18+.

No duplicate accounts

Duplicate accounts will be banned. Your most active account will be kept.

Breaking Flirtual Community Guidelines outside of Flirtual

We can moderate users that break the Terms of Service or Community Guidelines on Flirtual. However, if rule-breaking happens on a different platform other than Flirtual, we may not have the power to moderate. If you see a Flirtual user breaking guidelines outside of Flirtual, feel free to report them on Flirtual, but make sure to report them on that platform too (e.g. Discord).

No attacking other users on your profile

Do not post the username or call out other Flirtual users in your bio. We handle moderation ourselves while respecting user privacy. You can flag a profile for our moderation team by pressing the "Report" button at the bottom of their profile.

No abuse or damage Flirtual products

Misusing Flirtual or attempts to maliciously exploit Flirtual will be investigated. Good-faith vulnerability research in accordance with our Terms of Service is welcome, and bugs can be reported via GitHub or email.

If you see something against the rules or something that makes you feel unsafe, please let us know.

Make a report

Press the "Report" button at the bottom of someone's profile to flag it for our moderation team. Please include any relevant information or evidence in your report.

Moderation appeals

If your account has been banned, you will receive an email with the reason for your ban. If you would like to appeal this decision, please reply to the ban email. If you have not received a response to your appeal within 30 days, it has been reviewed and denied.

More information

Terms of ServicePrivacy Policy
sticks_protect_zinc_explain:
Who We Are

The Data Controller responsible for your personal information is:

ROVR LABS INC. (DBA Flirtual)
6d - 7398 Yonge St, #776
Thornhill, ON, Canada, L4J 8J2

Data We Collect and How We Use It

Profile Data: To facilitate connecting you with other users, we display the profile information you provide us (such as your display name, profile pictures, bio, and age) to them, and factor some of this information into our matchmaking algorithm. You may voluntarily provide sensitive information (such as your sexuality and location) to be displayed on your profile. You can control the visibility of some profile data in the Privacy Settings.

Account Data: When you sign up, you provide us with account details (such as your email address) to create your account and authenticate you. We use your email to send you transactional notifications and, with your permission, marketing communications.

Message Data: We process the messages you send in order to facilitate communications with other users.

Purchase Data: If you make a purchase, we collect your transaction details (such as subscription type and billing history) to fulfill your order and comply with accounting requirements. We do not store your full payment card details directly; they are processed securely by our payment partners.

Connected Platform Data: If you connect an external account, we collect information from it (such as your Discord ID or VRChat username). We use this data to enable social sign-in, share your connected profile with matches to facilitate communications, display connected content on your profile, or support other integrations.

Verification Data: If you choose to verify your identity or age, or where required by law, we may process your government-issued ID and/or biometric data (such as photo, video, and face geometry) to confirm your identity.

Usage Data: We collect data about how you use our service (such as when you access it, how you navigate and interact with it). We use this data to provide and improve the service.

Technical Data: We collect data from your device (such as IP address, device/browser identifiers, error/crash data, hardware and software information). We use this data to secure your account, customize your experience, and improve our service.

Additionally, we may use the above data to ensure the safety and security of our platform, prevent fraud, provide customer support, and comply with legal requirements. We may use aggregate or anonymized data to promote our service.

Legal Basis for Processing

We process your data under the following legal bases:

Contractual Necessity: To provide our service (such as matchmaking, messaging, and facilitating social interactions).

Legitimate Interest: To ensure the safety and security of our platform, prevent fraud, and analyze usage to improve our service.

Legal Obligation: To comply with valid legal requests and reporting requirements.

Consent: For sensitive personal information you voluntarily provide (such as sexual orientation, precise geolocation, and biometric data) and for marketing communications. You may withdraw this consent at any time in the Settings.

Automated Profiling

We use an automated matchmaking algorithm to suggest compatible users to you, and to suggest your profile to other users. Our algorithm considers factors including matching profile data (such as interest tags, personality similarity, and geographic proximity), recent activity, and whether a user has already expressed interest in your profile. These factors are prioritized according to a combination of our preset values and, in some cases, user-defined weights. Results are filtered based on your preferences and theirs (such as gender, age, and other filters you choose). We do not use profiling to make decisions that produce legal or similarly significant effects on you.

How We Share Data

We use trusted third parties to help us provide our services. We share data with them only to the extent necessary for them to perform their specific function. We review third parties we engage with to ensure they have adequate data protection and information security measures in place. We take measures to protect and anonymize data shared with third parties, as appropriate given the nature of the services provided. We do not sell your data.

Cloud Hosting Services: To provide reliable infrastructure for managing our platform.

In-App Functionality Services: To facilitate key features such as messaging and image hosting.

Billing Services: To manage payments and subscriptions.

Connected Platform Services: To enable social sign-in, display connected information, and facilitate other integrations.

Security and Performance Services: To safeguard our platform and deliver content globally.

Insight and Improvement Services: To analyze usage and technical data in order to improve our service.

Communication Services: To deliver transactional notifications and marketing communications.

Moderation Services: To detect harmful content, and ensure the safety and security of our platform.

Verification Services: To securely verify your identity and age.

IT Services: To assist in business operations, such as ticketing systems for customer support.

Legal Authorities and Safety Organizations: To comply with valid legal requests and reporting requirements.

International Data Transfers

We are headquartered in Canada. Your data is processed on servers located in the United States, accessed by our global team, and delivered via a global edge network.

By using Flirtual, you acknowledge that your data may be processed in countries outside your residence (including the US, Canada, and others) to ensure performance and support our business operations.

For users in the EEA, UK, and Switzerland, we rely on the EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework, UK Extension to the EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework, and Swiss-U.S. Data Privacy Framework for transfers to certified US providers; and Standard Contractual Clauses for transfers to other providers or jurisdictions. Canada is recognized by the European Commission as providing an adequate level of data protection.

Your Rights

Access, Portability, and To Know: You can view some data directly in the Settings. You can request a copy of your data by emailing us.

Rectification and Correction: You can update some data directly in the Settings.

Deletion and Erasure: You can delete some specific data directly in the Settings. You can also delete your account in the Settings.

Objection and Restriction: You can opt out of some data processing, including sensitive personal information, by deleting it or controlling its visibility directly in the Settings. You can opt out of anonymous usage analytics in the Privacy Settings.

Consent Withdrawal: You can withdraw consent you've given us directly in the Settings. You can also withdraw some device permissions (such as push notification and precise location access) in your device settings.

If you cannot access your account, or have any other privacy request, please email us. We will verify your identity and respond within 30 days. We may deny your request if we are unable to verify your identity, if your request is invalid, or if your request may infringe on someone else's privacy or other rights.

If you are a resident of a US state with applicable privacy laws and we deny your request, you may appeal our decision by emailing us. If you are unsatisfied with the result of your appeal, you may contact the Attorney General of your state.

If you have any concerns about how we process your data, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada or, depending on your jurisdiction, your local data protection authority if you believe your data has not been handled in accordance with the GDPR, CCPA, or other local data privacy regulations:

European Union and European Economic Area: Find your national supervisory authority here.

United Kingdom: Information Commissioner's Office.

California: Attorney General's Office.

Other jurisdictions: Depending on your location, other data protection laws may grant you similar or additional rights. We encourage you to explore the data protection rights available to you in your jurisdiction, or contact us for more information.

How Long We Retain Your Data

We retain transaction records, customer support records, and supporting data for 7 years to comply with accounting requirements.

If you verify your identity or age, your ID and biometric data is deleted immediately after the verification is complete.

If your account is suspended for violating our terms, we retain limited data necessary to prevent you from opening a new account (such as your email, usernames, IP address, and device/browser identifiers) and moderation records (such as reports, flagged data, and enforcement actions) for as long as necessary to ensure the safety of our platform.

Otherwise, we retain your data until your account is deleted. If your account remains inactive for two years, we will automatically delete it. If your account is suspended for violating our terms, we will automatically delete it (except the limited safety data described above) after 30 days.

When your account is deleted or you remove specific data from your profile, it is immediately deleted from our production systems. It may persist in disaster recovery snapshots for up to 7 days before being permanently erased.

Children's Privacy

Our service is strictly intended for individuals who are 18 years of age or older. We do not knowingly collect data from minors. If you are aware of someone under the age of 18 who has gained access to our service, please report their profile through the service or contact us.

Notice for California Residents

We do not sell or share your personal information for cross-context behavioral advertising. We only use your sensitive personal information (such as messages, sexual orientation, precise geolocation, and biometric data) to provide the direct service you have requested.

Contact

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact our Data Protection Officer by sending an email to privacy@flirtual.com.

If you find a vulnerability or privacy leak, please report it to us discreetly via GitHub or email.

committee_trucks_welcome_approval:
This service (the 'Service') is operated by ROVR LABS INC., doing business as Flirtual ('us', 'we', or 'Flirtual').

Rules

In order to use this Service, you must:

  1. be at least 18 years of age;
  2. be legally permitted to do so under Canadian and local laws
  3. have never been convicted of an indictable offense, felony, violent crime, or sex crime (unless pardoned or expunged);
  4. not be required to register as a sex offender on any government registry;
  5. agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

You agree not to:

  1. break local or Canadian law;
  2. solicit money from or defraud other users;
  3. impersonate any person or entity or post any images of another person without his or her permission;
  4. post any abusive, racist, sexist, derogatory, defamatory, illegal, NSFW, or otherwise harmful content to the Service;
  5. harass any of the users on this platform;
  6. knowingly post malicious code, or links to malicious sites, that could harm other users;
  7. post spam on profiles;
  8. infringe on any copyright;
  9. use this service in order to damage Flirtual or the Service.

Please review our Community Guidelines for more information on how we moderate user profiles and behavior on the Service. Breaking these guidelines will result in account moderation, such as a permanent ban from the Service. We reserve the right to moderate accounts at our discretion.

Safety

We advise you to use caution when interacting with other users of the Service. We are not responsible for the behavior of users on or off of the Service or for your interactions with other users. We do not screen users.

Your Content

You retain all rights and ownership of the content (such as photos, bio, and messages) you upload to Flirtual. By uploading content, you grant us a worldwide, royalty-free, sublicensable, non-exclusive license to host, copy, display, and distribute your content for the purpose of operating and improving the Service (such as displaying your profile to other users). This license continues until your content is erased as described in our Privacy Policy.

You represent and warrant that you have the right to upload the content you post and that it does not infringe on the intellectual property or privacy rights of any other person.

Privacy

You authorize us to use and display certain information about you. Please see our Privacy Policy for more information.

Purchases

All purchases and subscriptions are governed by our Payment Terms. Please review that policy for information on refunds, cancellations, and subscription management.

Third Party Services

Flirtual is not responsible for third-party services.

Rights

You can close your account at any time in your account settings.

You will be given at least 7 days' advance notice of any material changes to these terms or our Privacy Policy.

Moderation decisions will be made by our moderation team. You have the right to receive an explanation if your profile is modified or your account is cancelled for violation of these terms. You do not have the right to receive advance notice of these changes to your account.

If your account is suspended for violation of these terms, it will be deleted after 30 days, except for limited data that is retained longer as described in our Privacy Policy. Please contact us if you would like to appeal a moderation decision.

Your data will be backed up regularly.

Security

The Service runs on infrastructure provided by third parties. This infrastructure is protected by industry standard security efforts such as firewalls.

Your connection to the Service uses strong transport encryption.

Your password is stored securely hashed and salted.

You are responsible for keeping your account password safe. You are responsible for all activities that occur with your account credentials.

Despite best efforts, there is no such thing as perfect security online. We do not guarantee the absolute protection of your data.

We have not reviewed, and cannot review, all of the material, including computer software, made available through the websites and webpages to which the Service links, and that link to the Service. We do not have any control over those non-Flirtual websites, and are not responsible for their contents or their use. By linking to a non-Flirtual website, Flirtual does not represent or imply that it endorses such website. You are responsible for taking precautions as necessary to protect yourself and your computer systems from viruses, worms, Trojan horses, and other harmful or destructive content. Flirtual disclaims any responsibility for any harm resulting from your use of non-Flirtual websites and webpages.

Disclaimers

In no event will Flirtual, or its suppliers or licensors, be liable to the extent permitted by applicable law with respect to any subject matter of this Agreement under any contract, negligence, strict liability or other legal or equitable theory for: (i) any special, incidental or consequential damages; (ii) the cost of procurement for substitute products or services; (iii) for interruption of use or loss or corruption of data; or (iv) for any amounts that exceed the fees paid by you to Flirtual under this Agreement during the twelve (12) month period prior to the cause of action. Flirtual shall have no liability for any failure or delay due to matters beyond their reasonable control. The foregoing shall not apply to the extent prohibited by applicable law.

Governing Law

These terms are governed by the laws of the Province of Ontario and the federal laws of Canada applicable therein, without regard to conflict of law principles. You agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Toronto, Ontario, except where local law grants you the right to bring proceedings in your local courts.

motionless_absorbed_scintillating_rightf.0: VR is a personality-first way of meeting new people.
motionless_absorbed_scintillating_rightf.1: Avatars help you express yourself, without feeling self-conscious.

receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.6: You can find new friends in Homie Mode ‚úåÔ∏è
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.8: When someone likes or homies you back, it's a match!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.9: You can meet up with your matches in any VR app or game. What's your favorite?
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.11: A good bio and avatar pics are essential!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.12: Join our Discord to get feedback on your profile!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.13: We prioritize showing you people that have liked or homied you, so you can match.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.14: Using Flirtual actively, liking and homie-ing people will get you more matches.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.15: If you homie someone, and they like you, you'll still match (as homies).
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.16: Did you know? We have weekly events in VRChat. Speed dating, DJ nights, and more!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.17: Click "Events" at the bottom of the page for more info.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.18: Have an idea for Flirtual? Click "Ideas" at the bottom of the page to let us know!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.24: Did you know? Flirtual used to be called VRLFP.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.25: It stood for Virtual Reality Looking For Partner. Bit of a mouthful.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.30: Do you have the Flirtual mobile app? Check it out!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.32: You can customize your matchmaking algorithm in the settings. Crazy what technology can do!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.33: Safety tip: don't put your Discord in your bio! Use the Connection settings!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.34: Need a break? You can always deactivate your account and come back later. I'll miss you though.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.36: Do you hate passwords? Add a Passkey in the settings! Welcome to the future.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.38: Check out the #date-worlds channel in our Discord for date ideas!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.39: Flashbanged by Flirtual? Try Dark Mode in the settings!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.41: You can't do anything with them.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.46: Want to chat with me? Check out the #ask-flitty channel in our Discord!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.48: Safety tip: don't click sketchy links!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.50: How long are you going to keep clicking me?
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.52: Cats can rotate their ears 180 degrees.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.55: It's always good to have a backup.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.56: Cats have a unique nose print.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.58: Cats have a strong sense of smell.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.61: I'm a cat. That's a cat fact.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.62: Cats can make over 100 different sounds.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.63: Hmm, I can only seem to make one.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.64: Cats are actually robots sent from the future.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.65: Did I say that out loud?
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.66: The future is great. You met the love of your life on Flirtual!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.68: That's all for Cat Facts! I hope you learned something.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.78: Ask your cat if Flirtual is right for you.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.79: A typical mouse is rated for 20 million clicks.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.80: Thanks for using 0.002% of your mouse on me!
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.82: I'm running out of things to say.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.85: What do you want from me?
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.86: I have no more wisdom to offer.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.88: Maybe you'll find someone you like as much as you like clicking on me.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.89: You can tell them all your new Flirtulore and cat facts.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.90: I'm sure they'll be very impressed.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.91: It's been fun, but I really must be going.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.92: It's time for my cat nap.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.95: I hope you have a good time on Flirtual.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.96: If you want to chat more, find me in #ask-flitty on Discord.
receptive_fairies_legal_thumb.100: You clicked on me 500 times. Congratulations, you win Flirtual! I'm so proud of you.

odd_blue_clownfish_gleam: We're always looking for success stories! Would you like to share one? By doing so, you agree that we may share your story.
dirty_pink_puffin_flow: If you'd like to share more information, please leave us a comment here!
teary_cuddly_midge_sew: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
tidy_known_whale_imagine: Here's a short guide! We're excited to introduce you to some amazing people :3
helpful_petty_peacock_hunt: Press the Like button! If they like you back, then you'll match and be able to message each other.
light_flat_racoon_buzz: Press the Homie button if you want to be friends. Whether you Like or Homie each other, you'll still match if it's mutual.
away_lime_hound_launch: Press the Pass button to move on to the next profile.
aloof_caring_niklas_fade: Press the Undo button to go back and see the previous profile.
mushy_sound_nils_fetch: View your matches here. Send them a message and meet up in VRChat or your favorite VR game!
chunky_zany_leopard_peek: Switch between Date Mode (the heart) and Homie Mode (for finding friends) to see more profiles.
honest_loud_felix_favor: Each day, you can browse up to 30 profiles in each other. You'll be able to Like or Homie up to 15 of them in each mode.
sad_spare_grizzly_twirl: Here you can update your profile, or subscribe to Premium. Premium lets you browse unlimited profiles each day and see who likes you before you match.
mealy_lime_mayfly_support: That's all! We hope you have a great time here.
dry_tame_sloth_yell: Don't forget to drink water and take breaks!
cozy_such_jannes_laugh: You can upgrade to Premium to browse unlimited profiles and see who's already liked you.
small_drab_rooster_drum: You can also continue in <browseLink>Homie Mode</browseLink>, where you can meet new friends.
tense_active_gibbon_dare:
You may have mentioned your Discord username on your profile.



For your privacy, we strongly recommend removing your Discord from your bio or display name. This helps protect you from spam and unwanted messages.



Instead, connect your Discord account, which only shares your Discord with people you've matched with.
trite_alert_ibex_shine:
California subscribers: you may cancel your subscription and request a refund at any time before midnight of the third business day following the date you purchased any Premium subscription. If you subscribed through your Apple ID, refunds are handled by Apple. Please visit Apple Support to request a refund. If you subscribed through our website or Google Play, please contact us to request a refund. Please use your Flirtual account email address in your refund request.

Subscriptions

Subscriptions automatically renew until you cancel. To avoid being charged for a new subscription period, you must cancel your subscription as outlined below before the current subscription period ends. Deleting your account does not cancel Apple ID or Google Play subscriptions. Uninstalling the app from your device does not cancel your subscription, or delete your account.

To cancel your subscription, log in to your account, click/tap your profile icon in the corner, then "Premium", then the "Manage" button.

If you subscribed through your Apple ID, you can also cancel your subscription through the App Store, or contact Apple Support for help.

If you subscribed through Google Play, you can also cancel your subscription through Google Play, or contact Google Play Support for help.

After canceling your subscription, you can continue using the service until the end of your current subscription term. The subscription will not renew.

If you initiate a chargeback or reverse a payment, Flirtual may immediately terminate your account and assume you no longer want the subscription. If the chargeback is overturned, please contact us within 30 days to resume your subscription.

We reserve the right to change our pricing, and to modify, add, or remove features and benefits included in our subscription tiers or paid services at any time. We will provide you with at least 7 days' advance notice of any price changes for active subscriptions. Continued use of the subscription after a price or feature change comes into effect constitutes your agreement to the change.

Account deletion

You can delete your account at any time by logging in to Flirtual, clicking/tapping on your profile icon in the corner, then "Settings", then "Deactivate account", then "Permanently delete your account".

Flirtual reserves the right to investigate and, if necessary, suspend or terminate your account without a refund, or prevent you from accessing Flirtual, if it believes you have violated our Terms of Service or Community Guidelines, misused Flirtual, or engaged in behavior deemed inappropriate or unlawful, on or off Flirtual.

Refunds

Generally, all purchases, including but not limited to Flirtual Premium subscriptions, are non-refundable. Special terms for refunds apply in the EU, EEA, UK, Switzerland, Korea, Israel, Arizona, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Illinois, Iowa, Minnesota, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, Rhode Island, and Wisconsin.

For subscribers residing in the EU, EEA, UK, and Switzerland: In accordance with local law, you are entitled to a full refund within 14 days after your subscription begins. This 14-day period starts when the subscription starts.

For subscribers residing in Germany: You may terminate your subscription after it has renewed with a one-month notice period. Your right to terminate for cause will not be affected.

For subscribers and purchasers of consumable items residing in the Republic of Korea: In accordance with local law, you are entitled to a full refund of your subscription and/or unused consumable items within 7 days following the purchase. This 7-day period starts immediately upon the purchase.

For subscribers residing in Arizona, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Illinois, Iowa, Minnesota, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, Rhode Island, Wisconsin, and Israel: You may cancel your subscription without penalty or obligation at any time before midnight on the third business day after the date you subscribed (excluding Sundays and holidays). If you pass away before the end of your subscription period, your estate is entitled to a refund for the portion of the subscription payment applicable to the period after your death. If you become disabled and unable to use Flirtual before the end of your subscription period, you are entitled to a refund for the portion of the subscription payment applicable to the period after your disability, by providing the company notice in the same manner as requesting a refund as described below.

In addition to canceling your subscription, you must request a refund in order to receive one. If you subscribed through your Apple ID, refunds are handled by Apple. Please visit Apple Support to request a refund, or visit the App Store, click/tap on your Apple ID, then "Purchase history", find the transaction for your Flirtual subscription, and click/tap "Report Problem" to request a refund. If you subscribed through our website or Google Play, please contact us to request a refund. Please use your Flirtual account email address in your refund request.

By using our app and making in-app purchases, you consent to our sharing of data regarding your usage and consumption of purchased content with Apple, as part of our efforts to resolve refund requests. This information may include details about how you have accessed and interacted with the purchased content. The purpose of sharing this data is to help Apple make an informed decision regarding refund requests. We ensure that such data sharing is done in compliance with Apple's policies and only as necessary to process your requests.
